data.title: Edmonton Global
data.meta_description: Edmonton Global is a foreign direct investment and international business development company. We represent the Edmonton Region in Alberta, Canada.
data.text:
Proudly representing a region that has it all

Edmonton Global is a foreign direct investment (FDI) and international business development agency. We’re a hub that represents 14 municipalities in our region.

Our vision

We are focused on making the Edmonton region the choice location for global investment and building a sustainable and prosperous future for the Edmonton region.

Our purpose

The purpose of Edmonton Global is to radically transform and grow the economy of the Edmonton region.

Our work

We are advocates and connectors, dedicated to facilitating relationships between our innovation and support network, businesses at home, and investors abroad.

Discover our region

Our work

Regionally

We work closely with local companies to help expand their international reach through trade and export and by establishing an international presence. We collaborate with and connect the region’s economic development partners, industry, government, academia, and Indigenous communities—all of which have a role to play in collectively pursuing greater regional prosperity.

Internationally

We attract foreign direct investment (FDI) and promote the region as a top location for sustainable investment.

To attract and retain business investment and promote trade from our region, we:

promote the Edmonton region globally

strengthen and support growth

drive innovation

encourage competitiveness

build relationships at all levels of government

make connections
